open.title: Afrihost Outage | Openserve Northern Region
open.description: We are investigating reports of clients with no service on Openserve in Pretoria, Centurion and surrounding areas. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Afrihost engineers are working on mitigating the impact currently experienced. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vuma Reach Outage | Motherwell
open.description: Vumatel Reach has informed us of a network outage affecting Motherwell. Affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Vumatel Reach engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Afrihost Outage
open.description: We are currently investigating reports of intermittent connectivity issues affecting clients on the Afrihost network. Some users may be unexpectedly redirected to the Afrihost login page. Our team is actively working to identify the root cause and implement a resolution as quickly as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your patience during this time.

updates.content: Afrihost engineers are still actively working on resolving the unexpected redirects to the Afrihost login page. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.
